director.name: 文德林·范奥尔登堡 Wendelien van Oldenborgh

introduction: Made in two parts that mirror each other in form and content, Prologue: Squat/Anti-Squat (2016) sheds light on a squatting action in the Bijlmer district in 1970’s Amsterdam by a group of Dutch Caribbean activists, juxtaposing it with two recent episodes of occupation. In a condensed two-day shoot the film brings together over a dozen individuals from different generations with various backgrounds.
